title: Painting, "Farmyard with Ducks and Chickens", 1872–73
signed: Signed in brush and black oil ?, lower left: HOMER
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
dimensions:
Overall: 40 x 57.8cm (15 3/4 x 22 3/4in.)
Frame: 55.9 x 73.7 cm (22 x 29 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a barn with a lean-to shed; to left, are two hay-ricks and a farm wagon.  Chickens and ducks on fences and in grass, toward foreground; leafy trees surrounding, in background.

tombstone.epitaph: Painting, "Farmyard with Ducks and Chickens", 1872–73.Brush and oil on canvas. Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1918-20-4.
